preface.title: Foreword
preface.para: The world of web services has been on a fast track to supernova ever since the architect astronauts spotted another meme to rocket out of pragmatism and into the universe of enterprisey. But thankfully all is not lost, for you can rewrite this placeholder text!

If you want your Foreword to have an attribution at the end, use the <prefaceinfo> element as demonstrated here. The stylesheets will render this as a right-aligned “—Firstname Lastname” below the final paragraph.
